mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, pwd, role, organize_id, organize_name FROM user, organize WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user.organize_id = organize.id AND pwd = #{pwd} AND role IN ('admin', 'sa')
SELECT user_id, username, organize_name FROM user, organize WHERE organize_id = #{organizeId} ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, username, pwd, role, organize_name FROM user, organize WHERE user.organize_id = organize.id
SELECT user.user_id, username, created_at FROM user, image WHERE organize_id = #{organizeId} AND user.user_id = image.user_id GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user.user_id FROM user, image WHERE organize_id = #{organizeId} AND user.user_id = image.user_id) AND organize_id = #{organizeId}
SELECT count(distinct user.user_id) FROM user, image WHERE organize_id = #{organizeId} AND user.user_id = image.user_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user.user_id FROM user, image WHERE organize_id = #{organizeId} AND user.user_id = image.user_id) AND organize_id = #{organizeId}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS hour_start, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM image GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') ORDER BY hour_start;
